archimate:Requirement.name: Solutions and services need to be optimized from total cost of ownership (TCO) perspective. TCO needs to consider full solution lifecycle, including transformation, projects and run-phase, and all costs (labour, HW, SW, 3rd party services, SaaS; Tietoevry internal costs and 3rd party purchases). â€‹
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This requirement is derived directly from the Tech Services Architecture Principles.
